description.en: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.ar: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.br: Uma das 3 capas lendárias, todo Lorde recebe uma.
description.cns: 在瑞加大陆从古代留传下来的三大传说的披风(荣耀,光芒,龙王)中之一，只有领主可以使用。
description.de: Einer von 3 legendären Umhängen, jeder Lord erhält einen.
description.fi: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.fil: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.fr: Une des 3 capes légendaires, chaque Souverain en obtient une.
description.id: Satu dari 3 jubah legendaris, setiap Lord mendapat satu.
description.it: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.jp: マドリガル大陸に昔から伝えられているロード専用の伝説のマント。
description.kr: 마드리갈 대륙에 옛부터 전해저 내려오는 전설의 3대 망토(영광,빛,용왕) 중 하나로써, 군주만 착용이 가능하다.
description.nl: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.pl: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.sp: Una de las tres capas legendarias, que sólo el Lord puede usar.
description.sw: One of 3 legendary cloaks, every Lord gets one.
description.th: หนึ่งใน 3 เสื้อคลุมในตำนาน ลอร์ดทุกคนจะได้รับ
description.tw: 在瑪德利賈大陸從古代留傳下來的三大傳說的斗篷(榮耀,光芒,龍王)中之一。
description.vi: Một trong 3 chiếc áo choàng huyền thoại, mỗi Chúa đều nhận được một chiếc.
